title: Centennial Light
summary: The Centennial Light is the world's longest-lasting light bulb, burning since 1901, and almost never switched off.  It is at 4550 East Avenue, Livermore, California, and  maintained by the Livermore-Pleasanton Fire Department.[1] Due to its longevity, the bulb has been noted by The Guinness Book of World Records,[2] Ripley's Believe It or Not!, and General Electric.[3]
